definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: When Poissons ratio is zero, tile exact solution of displacement is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 当泊桑比为零时，求得位移的精确解。

sentences.english: The optimal conjugation ratios of immunogen and coating antigen were 13 and 10.
sentences.chinese: 人工免疫原及包被原的最适结合比为13和10。

sentences.english: When bad men combine,good men must associate.
sentences.chinese: 当坏人朋比为奸时，好人应该联合起来。

sentences.english: In fact, the physical ratio of silver to gold in the earth’s crust is 16 to 1.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，白银和黄金在地壳中含量之比为16:1。

sentences.english: When Poisson's ratio is zero, the exact solution of displacement is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 当泊桑比为零时，求得位移的精确解。

definition: to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
